latex:
Let $f(x)=ax^2+bx+c$, where $a$, $b$, and $c$ are integers. Suppose that $f(1)=0$, $50 < f(7) < 60$, $70 < f(8) < 80$, and $5000k < f(100) < 5000(k+1)$ for some integer $k$. What is $k$?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 1 \qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ 2 \qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ 3 \qquad
\textbf{(D)}\ 4 \qquad
\textbf{(E)}\ 5
$
